text.__SUMMARY__: Aloe argenticauda is a species of plant in the genus Aloe. It is endemic to Namibia.  Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry shrubland and rocky areas.
text.References: Loots, S. 2004.  Aloe argenticauda.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded 20 August 2007.
